DOC.brief_title: Lacidipine In Mild To Moderate Essential Hypertension Patients With Type 2 Diabetes In Korea
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Newly diagnose essential hypertension treat past 2 week ( If subject take medication past 2 week , washout period least 2 week complete prior perform screening ( week 2 ) assessment ) Mean seat SBP screen visit = 130mmHg ( measured mercury sphygmomanometer ) Type 2 diabetes ( American Diabetes Association criterion 2004 ) HbA1C < 11 % Agree practice acceptable contraceptive measure study , 30 day last dose study medication take subject female childbearing potential Provide write informed consent Exclusion criterion : Mean seat SBP > 180 mmHg Known suspect secondary hypertension Anemia define haemoglobin concentration < 10.0 g/dL Hemoglobinopathy peripheral vascular disease Clinically significant renal hepatic disease ( i.e. , subject serum creatinine = 2.0 mg/dL ; Alanine aminotransferase , Aspartate aminotransferase , total bilirubin , alkaline phosphatase > 2.5 time upper limit normal reference range ) Unstable severe angina , coronary insufficiency , congestive heart failure require pharmacologic treatment Chronic disease require intermittent chronic treatment oral , intravenous , intraarticular corticosteroid ( i.e . use topical , inhaled nasal corticosteroid permissible ) Female lactating , pregnant , plan become pregnant clinically significant abnormality identify screen judgement investigator make subject unsuitable inclusion study ( e.g . physical examination , laboratory test , electrocardiogram etc . ) Acute chronic metabolic acidosis history diabetic ketoacidosis
